page.title: 11Home Life.
page.content: We have been thinking about how children in Whitchurch spend their day.Here is one example of how a ten year old girl spends her day. We all get up between seven o'clock and half past seven.I race downstairs to breakfast with my sister.When we have finished our breakfast my best friend comes to collect me for school.We arrive at school at about a quarter to nine,and go in at nine o'clock.We do Maths,English,Science or Art. When school is over I rush home and normally collapse in front of the television and watch some good programmes,the one I like best at the moment is called Cover Up.Tea is usually about five thirty.Bed time is nine o'clock
